section.name: Count modified at publish
section.span: What does the count of modified documents mean, which is shown after publishing?

div.p: After the action publish all in folder is completed, the dialog shows you how many documents are actually modified by the action, which means that they are published.
Documents that are being edited are not affected by the action. Note that this includes not only documents that you are editing, but also documents that authors are editing.

In the screenshot the editor Janine is working on the document multibazar2009. This document is not affected by the action. This is the only document someone is working on, so the count of documents modified is one less than the count of documents to publish.
